reviewText: I have already reviewed this movie as I have all that follow on the listing.  They are all good movies and received in great condition.  They make a good additions to my collection.  Thank you for very good service.  Great addition to my Danielle Steel collection.

Never had seen this movie and it was stunning!
This movie was a good adaptation of the book. Although there were some details that were changed it did not take away from the story.

No mini-series could measure up to Danielle Steel's, "The Ring." But Vanished hooked and kept my interest throughout the film. It is interesting that each of the " supposedly evil" main characters had a basic foundation of good will about him or her.

I don't want to give away the story, but George Hamilton and his paramour used underhanded methods to take a child that they could love and cherish as his mother and father.
 I guess they rationalized the pain they inflicted on the Lisa Rinni character.
Reasonably true to life.
Fine acting and production values.
The product arrived through the promised shipping method and as promised. It was very useful for the purpose I got it for.
I never saw coming the betrayal of her husband.  I never would have believed he would take the son. Great work - beautifully performed.
Of all the Danielle Steel stories this is the darkest.  It is still a great movie and good story, but a little darker than the rest.  There are also some real sad stories.
Love Danielle Steele books and now I can watch the movies.  What more could a woman want?  More Chocolate!! lol
I didn't know what to expect, but the movie was enjoyable and full of excitement, of what you didn't know will come next.
